subject: Re: [PATCH 11/13] ovl: use is_subdir() for testing if one thing is a subdir of another

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown pointed out that the patch to use is_subdir() for testing if one thing is a subdir of another in ovl: change ovl_create_real() to get a new lock when creating a real file or dir, and ovl_lookup_real_one() should be simplified.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about patch [PATCH 11/13] ovl: use is_subdir() for testing if one thing is a subdir of another, but ultimately approved it with Reviewed-by tag.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for all patches except one, where he pointed out a minor issue that needs to be fixed.
